name: Hungry Hungry Kraken
description:
I created this game for a jam/contest related to the git GUI client GitKraken.

You play as the hungry kraken, and try to eat as many boats as possible while avoiding the exploding barrels which will blow off your tentacles!

Unfortunately, I did not end up having as much time as I'd hoped for to participate in the contest, so the whole game ended up feeling a little half-baked.

Attributions for art used:

  • Kraken body taken from the GitKraken logo
  • Explosion sound by dklon on opengameart.org
  • Explosion art by Lucas Beyer on opengameart.org
  • Background music:
    Pamgaea Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
